website_summaries.verdict: This remarkably inexpensive money clip wallet is praised for its helpful features and impressive magnet.
pros: Magnet clip can hold around 30 bills folded in half
Many color options for both men and women

customer_reviews.title: Great Wallet
customer_reviews.text: Great wallet. Pros- - 5 slots for credit cards including a hidden one - hole in the ID slot makes it easy to slip out my ID when purchasing items -Magnet for the money clip is extremely strong. It will attach to a car if I am wearing basketball shorts which I think is funny. Cons- -I was worried about the magnet demagnetizing my credit cards but I haven't had a problem since I got this wallet a month ago. All in All I would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Doug AnjahTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Nice design, but little or no RFID blocking.
customer_reviews.text: As a wallet it has a nice form factor. Build quality is very good and the magnetic clip would have a obsolete have worked well. Having recently been a victim of bank fraud while traveling abroad I wanted to get a wallet that blocked scanning well. So as soon as we returned home I ordered this. Unfortunately as far as the RFID blocking capabilities it left much to be desired. I tested this with a few cards and readers at work and I could scan every single one. Tried different pockets and they all failed. A coworker has a different, hard shell wallet and it worked perfectly. I will have to go for function over form I guess!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen B.

customer_reviews.title: Not Functional for us guys
customer_reviews.text: Like you, I was curious about this wallet and the prospects of having a thinner wallet. I reached out to support - 3 times, and got half answers about the concern for the magnet damaging cards. They dance around this topic quite a bit, read the other comments. On my 5th attempt, I finally got an answer to keep cards far away from the magnet. My delivery arrived and I tried to jam single cards into the spaces. NOT. This simply isn't a practical wallet for a man who doesn't want their cards erased in the wallet. Better luck next time
customer_reviews.author: Eric & Tiare

customer_reviews.title: Strong magnets
customer_reviews.text: Great deal so far. If it changes, i will update.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: The magnet inside ruins credit and debit cards.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this wallet for a trip to New York City. After arriving I found out the magnet in the money clip demagnetized all my credit cards, hotel room key and a $20 metro card. Now I am stuck in New York City with no credit or debit cards until visa can overnight a new card to the hotel. I would not recommend the magnetic money clip!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome wallet! Super low profile
customer_reviews.text: Awesome super thin wallet. Can hold up to 8-10 cards before it starts getting full. The magnet on my wallet broke in half inside the wallet but that has not been an issue as it is concealed inside the wallet and functionality is not hindered. My RFID card to enter work still works without having to get the card out which I did not expect with a magnetized money clip. It should be noted that magnets can ruin the strip on the back of the card/hotel keys (I have gone through several) keep cards in their slots and in general away from the magnets whenever possible and you should be fine (I have had no credit cards ruined yet).
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Fox

customer_reviews.title: Way better then the more expensive options
customer_reviews.text: Got this for our motorcycle. Wife doesn't need to bring her 17lb. Satchel with. Just what we need. This has improved our gas mileage by 20% aerodynamics by 100%. Only downfall to it is there is now 74% more storage space available for clothes to buy along the ride. So this $10 purchase has cost us $100's more than intended.
customer_reviews.author: A.M.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality at a literally unbeatable price
customer_reviews.text: Nearly everything about this beats every front pocket wallet I've seen under $30. Super strong magnets and quality stitching. This is the miracle of Amazon in bringing top notch products at crazy low prices and making everyone's quality of life go up in the process. Only complaint is that it says "full grain leather" in the description and it clearly is not. Full grain leather is super thick - not sacrificing any layer of the animal skin. Because of this, the edges don't typically need to be folded and stitched. This leather, while appearing durable, is anything but thick and is folded and stitched along all edges.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Survived a year in Vietnam
customer_reviews.text: I live in Vietnam where the heat and sweat tear things up. This survived regular use well so far. The leather is still in good shape, not gummy or cracking. The clear plastic in front of my license is still pliable, not hard nor cracking. The magnetic clip holds a decent amount of cash before it’s too thick (maybe 20 bills or so). Indeed, it’s so strong I worried about it being in the same pocket as my phone. I usually keep them in separate pockets, but occasionally make a mistake and put them in my front pocket together. Fortunately, no issues yet.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Give your Wallet a weightlose
customer_reviews.text: I bought my first money clip wallet similar to this 3 years ago. I liked it so much I bought another. I like this style of wallet better than the traditional bulky wallet because of its simplicity. This wallet prevents me carrying unnecessary items. Like receipts and cards (membership or business). I keep those items stored in the area underneath the armrest of my vehicle. Because my wallet is so slim, I carry it in my front pocket. The slim wallet profile looks so much better while wearing suits.
customer_reviews.author: DYER

customer_reviews.title: Weak magnet
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately my 10 year old pocket wallet was getting worn out and I needed more card slots. This one provides the additional card slots and the reviews praise the strong magnet, bit it isn't as strong as I my old wallet and could be stronger. This is the second pocket wallet I've ordered - I returned the first one because the magnet was so weak. This one isn't much better. If you are desperate for a new pocket wallet this the best so far that I've been able to find, but the magnet could be stronger.
customer_reviews.author: Les

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I dig this little guy. I've always been a bi-fold type guy but it's 2020 so what the hell, I'll try something new. I'm able to carry 3 credit cards, driver's license, and CCW card comfortably. The magnet is strong enough to hold about 15 bills folded in half. I like that it forces me to keep it light. Before I had everything in my wallet, even though I only ever used the same 2 cards. Simplicity.
customer_reviews.author: Topher

customer_reviews.title: Great minimalist wallet
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for when I travel so I don't have to carry my complete wallet. I have found myself using this full-time instead of my not-so-cheap Coach wallet. The form factor is awesome and the magnet is strong enough to hold all my $1 bills to make it rain (just kidding). I went with the cork since it was different and I have had quite a few compliments on it - not something I expect from a wallet period, but especially a $10 wallet. I don't know if it is actually RFID blocking - but hey, let me check real quick.......Sure enough, when I put my access badge in the wallet, the reader didn't detect it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great EDC wallet that perfectly fits Fisher bullet space pen
customer_reviews.text: Bought this wallet and have been super happy with the slim profile and high quality. One of the big bonuses is that if you want to carry a pen around with you as well, the Fisher space bullet pen fits perfectly in the inner pocket. I secured mine with some tape around a credit card to really keep it in there, but it sits on the outer ridge and pops in almost like it was made for it! couldn't be happier
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: cards  protected!
customer_reviews.text: I'm amazed of how well it holds up to ten cards & the magnet so powerful even after putting $100 bills of one's,it still wonts hold more! I love that it as a security projection for your cards, to not be scanned by scammers! I was recently affected some two years back! I was the subject of that type of thing happening to me, vacation out of state, one of my bank card was scanned and stolen money/resolved! Iam glad, I've got this wallet to protect my personal cards! I am truly thankful! highly recommended! Got mine delivered tonight!
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: did i forget my wallet?
customer_reviews.text: I was not sure how I would like a wallet like this at first. I always use to carrying a fat wallet with a bunch of useless crap. Now that I have converted over to a thin wallet, I think i will stick with it. The first week was the worst, since I always felt like i forgot my wallet, since I was not able to feel it in my pocket. Now that I am use to having a thin small easy to access wallet, I love it. I always hated trying to pry out my ID card out of my old wallet, but this one it so quick and easy it no longer a issue.
customer_reviews.author: Zigma

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: I was wanting to move from a regular wallet to something smaller...wallet in back pocket with cash in money clip in front pocket. This was the solution. Although this is not a permanent solution of eliminating a wallet (I carry too many cards, credit, debit, health insurance, dental, etc. etc.) but a very good alternative for a weekend out. Although it didn't meet my expectations to replace a wallet, it is as described and a nice, slick alternative for those situations you don't need to carry all your s**t.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Great Wallet
customer_reviews.text: Been using this wallet for a few months and love it. Big enough for a lot of cards but small enough to comfortably fit in a front pocket. With everything nowadays having rewards cards it’s important to have the space to fit more than a couple cards. This one does. I currently have 12 cards in mine and have room for a few more if need be. While it’s only been a few months it appears to be holding up great and shows zero signs of wear.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Krause

customer_reviews.title: Had to fix my posture and move my wallet from my back pocket to my front pocket.
customer_reviews.text: The magnet is very very strong, yet it does not erase my credit cards. This wallet is great. A few times I have had to carry a big wad of cash temporarily and this Money clip does it no problem. My prime motivation for this wallet is I needed to not have a wallet in my back pocket due to issues with my posture and back. It's been hard to get used to having my wallet in my front pocket, but slowly but surely I am getting used to it.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Rael

customer_reviews.title: Magnet holds several bills securely
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the overall wallet is very good. The main concern for me was the strength of the magnet to hold 10 to 20 bills. It will do this with no problem. There is also a discreet pocket that will hold more cash in addition to the card slots. Bought this on a lightning buy and feel I got a Great product at a Very good price. I would reccommend this wallet to anyone who likes a front pocket style wallet.
customer_reviews.author: ronniemac

customer_reviews.title: very nice wallet.. has not hurt my cards at all so far
customer_reviews.text: this wallet is bad ass. i was skeptic of card deactivation at first but hasnt happened yet also i have done bought 3 of these yes they are that badass. small yet compact and magnet is a beast...buy one u want regret it also just keep cards away from magnet if you are worried it will deactivate cards. great product all around ill end up buying one of each style and color just because i absolutley love em
customer_reviews.author: Justin and linda

customer_reviews.title: Very lightweight, little guy
customer_reviews.text: Truly like this little wallet. Just enough space for a little needs. The magnet is great, from the photo you can see i have cash under the magnet; I also put my finger there just to see the pressure it had. It's pretty tight on my finger and overall the money just hasn't moved anywhere(it's about 5 bills folded on itself). I'm satisfied about the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: K. Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Holds money firmly!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my hubby, he loves it. He was a bit skeptical at first, but he’s used it for a number of weeks and is impressed with how tightly it does hold the money. The magnet is very strong, and he has felt secure using this wallet. Only thing he noticed is it is a bit hard to pull out the drivers license, even with the hole to help push it out. All in all, he is very happy and glad we bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Im tough on these - I like this one.
customer_reviews.text: I give these money clips a rough time because Im a hard working individual and it gets rough treatment. I like this model because it holds up fairly well. NOTE: If you stuff the slots with lots of credit cards and such it will stretch the leather. I dont carry much and its fine. It does streatch over time as expected. I expect to replace it again in about 12 months.
customer_reviews.author: The Rabbit Whisperer

customer_reviews.title: Looks and Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I'm a woman and HATE the giant, expensive, fussy wallets marketed to us. I use this for credit, debit, health insurance, and ID, plus any bills or important receipts. I do find that it can't comfortably hold too many folded bills without the top flap potentially skewing sideways and coming off from the magnet. I try not to carry around too much cash, so it's not a big problem. I love it for minimizing how much I have to carry around. It's also durable, and the leather ("leather?") feels great. I love the golden brown color in particular and think it's a great product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: AML

customer_reviews.title: Hope its all true.
customer_reviews.text: Here is my review. 1) Leather: It is real leather but I would have preferred it to be a little thicker. Im not sure this will hold up for very long. 4 of 5 stars. 2) Magnetic Clip: The clip that holds the cash is strictly magnetic. I guess I have a concern that any magnetic field will demagnetize my credit cards. But, until that happens 4 of 5 stars. 3) Drivers Licence pocket: Its difficult to get the licence out of the pocket. 3 of 5 stars. 4) Storage: All the credit card pockets are supposed to be RFID. If they are 5 of 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Marky Nark

customer_reviews.title: DESIGN
customer_reviews.text: This particular item was far below my expectations. first off its ugly, but that's just my opinion. It is too tight and you have to fight to get the cards out. the magnetic money holder on the back is really good for about 12 bills. The front part that holds the drivers license is bigger than it needs to be so you have to actually fight to get it out. I wouldn't gift it to anyone and I am currently looking for a better wallet.
customer_reviews.author: RookE281

customer_reviews.title: My husband Loves this Wallet
customer_reviews.text: I bought this wallet for my husband for traveling to Europe. He wanted just a money clip but when I saw this wallet it looked better so he could carry money and his credit cards and ID. He loved the smaller size than his regular wallet. It is more compact. He actually likes it so much that he uses it all the time now. The clip is very sturdy and will hold a good amount of cash. We are very pleased with this purchase and the price is very reasonable. It is very well made too.
customer_reviews.author: Clare Rice

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. When first used, its a little tight, like it doesn't want to give up the credit cards you put in, but after a few days of use, the pockets get a little worn in and its easier. Still snug fit. Magnet holds all the bills I need, though if you're planning on visiting a um... gentlemen's club...you might want to consider an alternative. The magnet is strong enough to hold a full wallet against the fridge, which is awesome as I like to stick things on my fridge. A bit juvenile in that regard I guess. Very happy so far with product
customer_reviews.author: Jack H

customer_reviews.title: Nice and Slim
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this wallet. His older one got put in the washer by mistake, so he needed something right away. This one is not as thick leather, but he seems to like it better. Lightweight and slim. The magnet is very strong to hold enough bills and the slots for pertinent cards needed. Great value for the price and it came right away. It was delivered by the time his other cards were dry! I would order again.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy P.

customer_reviews.title: A fine wallet - the perfect size for front pocket. Highest quality.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this wallet to replace a 10 year old Tumi of similar design. This wallet is wonderful - high quality construction and an excellent design. The magnetic clip is strong and the card slots are perfect size for US ID and credit cards. Stylish and beautifully packaged. Highly recommended for yourself or a gift you will be proud to give.
customer_reviews.author: ChuckCVG

customer_reviews.title: Durable and light weight
customer_reviews.text: I'm glad I got this, very easy to carry around. Light weight and the magnet clip is very sturdy. I put it to the test with stacking bills under the clip and it hold them securely, even the coins sticks to it, literally have to fight to get the coins off once the magnet gets a hold of it. Well value for the sale price. Magnet is not an issue with the cards/chip/RFID I have not experience any issue with my cards working.
customer_reviews.author: Mazda

customer_reviews.title: slim, secure, easily holds everything.
customer_reviews.text: Got this to replace a cheaply made disappointing card sleeve wallet. Love the magnetic money clip. I tend not to carry cash because it just wads up in my pocket. This wallet keeps everything nice and organized! It was a tight fit at fist and cards were difficult to remove, but over time it has relaxed and yet still holds everything firmly in place. The ID window is great too. The slot allows easy access for getting your ID out at the airport if when a clerk actually asks for ID verification on a card purchase! I would purchase this one again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: BAKSTL

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband. He’s had a different one for 4 years and it looked natty and he was losing bills the magnet was not strong enough. He absolutely loved this new one. It is a tad bigger but easier to use the middle storage slot. Loves having a place to see you drivers license. It looks very well put together, the leather is quality work. No problem in the front pocket. And the magnet is nice and strong.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Vennette

customer_reviews.title: Exactly What I Needed!
customer_reviews.text: I was getting a sore butt from my traditional wallet. Even after cleaning it out, I didn't like how it "worked" so I decided to try this front pocket wallet. I wish I had gotten it much sooner. It's perfect for how I want to be with my cash and cards. So far, the quality seems great, too. Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Boomerocity

customer_reviews.title: Oh I love this pocket wallet!
customer_reviews.text: Oh I love this pocket wallet! It's a quality well made item. I was a little concerned about the magnet clip being strong enough to hold money and if you are, don't be. That thing is strong. I've never had a problem with it anything falling out or the magnet harming a credit card, etc. The pockets are a little tight, but I'd rather have to dig out my driver's license and credit cards than for them to fall out easily. I would definitely purchase it again and I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Del

customer_reviews.title: Magnets not as strong as advertised at least for me
customer_reviews.text: Wallet does not hold 30 bills securly for me I can only get about 20 to fit without money flying everywhere wallet is good quality plastic for the I.D window is not cheap my only disappointment was the magnet not being as strong as advertised which is one if the reasons I purchased this wallet
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Tight fit
customer_reviews.text: This money clip is longer than I'm used to, so it's more like another smart phone in the pocket vs a wallet. It's pretty tough getting cards in and out, but hopefully will get better with time. If you need to get your license back out from behind the window, be prepared for some extra time or bring your needle nose pliers with you...it really sticks in there. Otherwise, a really nice quality of materials and workmanship and I'll use mine until it wears out. I'm not mad at it.
customer_reviews.author: wireless world

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely loved the design... but magnet wiped out the mag strip on my hotel key UPDATE: No damage to other cards
customer_reviews.text: Just loaded up my new wallet last night, and left for a trip. I love the design, but realized this morning that the magnet wiped my room key for my hotel. I'm nervous now that it could have wiped my credit cards... (other reviews said it didn't). I'm hundreds of miles from home, so I'm going to know really soon if the wallet wiped all my cards... will report back soon... UPDATE: Hotel keys got wiped, but all credit cards were just fine, so the hotel keys must just be cheapies. Stuck my hotel keys in my other pocket and no other issues the rest of my trip. Love this wallet!
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Magnet
customer_reviews.text: I have had this wallet since February (3mo) and although skeptical at first I absolutely love it. I have had it quite beefy with contents and magnet holds it all steady. I currently have two cards per pocket and NONE of my cards have been magnetized. I posted the picture to share that I stopped to get gas, forgot I had put the wallet there while pumping right on the side of my vehicle. After I was done filling up I drove for 45 minutes at an average speed of 60mph and I was astonished to see that my wallet was still there. Damn I got lucky.
customer_reviews.author: Gus

customer_reviews.title: Finally a slim wallet that works!
customer_reviews.text: Was skeptical about the power of the magnets holding ability. Holds 12 folded bills - no problem. I've been using a stainless spring money clip for 20 years and getting an old dog to change his tricks is not an easy task. Well - I've been changed! Not only does this hold more bills more securely but I can now carry Driver License, Credit Card but the internal pocket can hold Business Cards, etc. All in one slim package. In fact I'm ordering a spare today.
customer_reviews.author: Tom in Oregon

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly Slim
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something I could keep in my pocket or throw in my bag when I'm on the go. In addition to that, as someone who has had a card number stolen, I wanted the added security of the RFID blocking. So, this is what I like: 1. Easy to slide cards in and out 2. Nice quality materials used 3. Magnet holds money securely
customer_reviews.author: D. E. M.

customer_reviews.title: Favorite wallet of all time
customer_reviews.text: I am on my second one. My first one lasted 2 years. I bought some for gifts for my friends. The magnet makes it so easy to just stick it to the side of the fridge. Now, I never lose my wallet. Plus, the magnet keeps my paper money secure. Small, compact holds everything I need and it versatile! Give it a month to break in. Feels bulky at first.
customer_reviews.author: Halfrightface

customer_reviews.title: One of the Best Slim wallets
customer_reviews.text: I’ve gone through a lot of slim wallets and this one is on top. It has plenty of space and the magnet money clip is strong. The weatherproof grey feels super nice. My only complaint is the magnet makes it a bit heavy (but won’t have issues). I just wish they had an open end version with no magnet (only black).
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Best wallet I have owned
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I was looking to downsize my wallet, and my husband had recently purchased it. I love this wallet. It does not hold as many cards as a traditional woman's wallet, and that was what I was looking for. The variety in styles assures you will find one you like. The magnet is very strong and has not failed me, despite testing its limits. I love the size and style. We are both very happy with our purchases.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Holds just what you need ...
customer_reviews.text: I finally got rid of the big wallet ... don't need the pictures anymore, they're in the phone! Feels good to have less but still what you need. This gives you plenty of pockets. The drivers license screen is hard for larger fingers to pull it out but you can bend the opening enough for it to work. Even with many bills, it's still compact and holds true with the magnets.
customer_reviews.author: Blunt Honesty.

customer_reviews.title: Breast Pocket Wallet
customer_reviews.text: My boy will only wear sport pants and never has a safe place for his ID. He thought he could use his breast pocket but we worried that it would fall out too easily there as well. The magnet on this wallet is very strong. His wallet will not fall out of his pocket and even a pickpocketer would have a struggle pulling it out. The stitching looks good. We like the cork exterior.
customer_reviews.author: Johanna Cormier

customer_reviews.title: I like it.
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that it is small. It only holds a few things at once. As a guy we have a habit of putting more then we need in our Wallet. The Magnets are very strong my keys or zippo stick to if they are in the same pocket and it holds my money very well.
customer_reviews.author: freedom6227

customer_reviews.title: Amazing wallet! Back pain gone!
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking at this clip for a while when it popped on a prime day deal. Although small compared to other things I bought that day this is hands down my favorite. I keep it in my back pocket, but because of its slim design am no longer getting that all too familiar back pain associated with a thick wallet. The magnet is strong enough to hold bills in place and there is enough room to keep the essential cards and ids all wrapped in a nice looking package. If I ever need a new wallet again it will be another of these for sure!
customer_reviews.author: NickC

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, great design. My new favorite wallet style
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding wallet. Bought this solely for a trip to New York where i was worried about theft if I were to use my usual wallet. Instead it has become my primary wallet of daily use. I don't know that it will last 10 years like my Tony lama has, with plenty of years of life left to spare....but the quality is definitely sufficient that I think it'll last.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Petrosky

customer_reviews.title: great wallet but be forewarned...
customer_reviews.text: I actually love the wallet. The size and weight is perfect. It is slim in my pocket and is exactly what I was looking for. What I never saw in any reviews is that the magnet (very strong) has demagnetized all of my credit cards. What a pain that is. So please know that you can not put credit cards next to the money clip as shown in the pictures. The magnet is so strong, it might even de-magnetize if the cards were on the other side. What a shame.
customer_reviews.author: Joshuaone9

customer_reviews.title: Cards don’t fit in it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband and when he went to put his drivers license, two credit cards and his business card in it, they didn’t fit. The card slots are very tight. The case is made well overall except the card slots. He decided not to use it so it’s sitting in the closet.
customer_reviews.author: TKub

customer_reviews.title: Works well for trips but too small for everyday
customer_reviews.text: I used this wallet/money clip on a trip to Europe. It was perfect for the limited number of cards I carried for the trip. The money clip worked ok but I was carrying about 15 to 20 bills and the clip didn't work well for that quantity. It does work well for less than 10 bills. It's to small for my personal everyday needs but works fine for occasions when you have limited needs for cards and other information. The quality is excellent and should hold up over time. I'm not sure about the RFID protection but it did work for me.
customer_reviews.author: henderbender

customer_reviews.title: Magnet problem
customer_reviews.text: After buying this in July and using it for a couple months i want to update my experience. Pros: its a great compact wallet, fits easily in my front pocket. Cards are tight and magnet works great. Had 20 bills in there and it held them no problem. Cons: I travel a lot and my hotel keys would stop working, often. Finally figured out the problem, that great magnet. It deactivates the room cards as well as gift cards. Sadly had to go back to my old school wallet. Disappointed because i really do like everything but that magnet issue.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Kinzd Front Pocket Wallet in Black.
customer_reviews.text: I had stopped carrying wallets some years now because of how bulky they can be and sitting on that bulk can be a health hazard. One remedy is the Kinzd front pocket wallet. I wish I had discovered this sooner. A wallet and money clip combination. Very masculine,slim and very comfortable to carry around. Just the right amount of slots for your important cards and identification. Well made with very soft leather.
customer_reviews.author: ranger

customer_reviews.title: Not good for holding cash.
customer_reviews.text: The wallet itself is very nice looking. However personally I was looking for a clip wallet that can hold a decent amount of cash. On the advertisement they claim 30 folded notes. This is simply not true. When experimenting myself it did not even shut with 25. I am unsure if my wallet was defective but I personally would stay away from magnetic clips in the future. The max the wallet can hold is 20 with questionable strength.
customer_reviews.author: joshua

customer_reviews.title: works well and it is good looking
customer_reviews.text: I have the cork version of this moneyclip/card holder. Its small and fits in my little purse very well. Now if they could figure out how to put a small coin purse on it.... This product seems well made and I like the look of it.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret M. McKinney

customer_reviews.title: just what Ive been looking for
customer_reviews.text: A great wallet that goes PERFECTLY with the Huntvp Military Tactical MOLLE Phone Pouch Waist Belt Bag Pack Gear Messenger Shoulder Saddlebag that I also just purchased as a 'day kit' carry case. I only have 6 cards and rarely carry cash anymore and this clip is just what ive been looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Son of Samhain

customer_reviews.title: Deactivates hotel card keys
customer_reviews.text: After so many replies that claimed it had no effect on credit cards I thought I would try a hotel card key first. Sure enough, it killed the card. I didn't use it with a credit card for obvious reasons. Too bad. It is a nice product if all you're going to carry is cash.
customer_reviews.author: LittleBear

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed to replace my metal clip and carry in my front pocket.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace a metal clip I used for my credit cards and cash. I am very happy. The money clip works perfectly. I usually carry about 5-10 bills of various denominations. I keep my often used credit cards in the slots behind the cash and about 3 others and business cards in the slot. I can remove my driver's license easily from the front. Seems to be well made and while it adds more bulk than my metal clip I can still carry it in my front pocket. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: On the fence? Get it!
customer_reviews.text: Great wallet. Really small and thin. Nice quality leather, stitching and glue work. Usually weary about magnetic money clips but this magnet is incredibly strong. There is a limitation of course. Don’t try to fold a stack of singles before heading to the strip club and expect the magnet to work. Without taking the time to do an real test, I estimate it can manage 15-20 folded bills
customer_reviews.author: J. Dannenberg

customer_reviews.title: Great wallet for price
customer_reviews.text: I really like this wallet. I waited a while to do the review to give honest feedback. My wallet takes it share of beatings and it’s held up very well. Great pocket size and plenty of options to hold cards, money and such. It’s form at first but give it a few weeks and it loosens up.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Cranford

customer_reviews.title: Strong Magnet but impossible to get cards out
customer_reviews.text: Sorry I purchased this. The magnet is very strong which I love (although I would worry that it would wreck the magnetic strips on my cards) but the real issue is that it is impossible to get a card out of the slots. Even after using for awhile you end up taking everything out just to prey the cards out. I dumped it and went back to my other wallet.
customer_reviews.author: carmens kindle 3

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice but watch your Hotel Cards!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality holds my cash, License & cc cards really nice ... However it did wipe my Hotel room card twice which was a bummer. When placed behind my license as far as possible from the magnets it was just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Mark R Wendt

customer_reviews.title: Great wallet - BAD magnet
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT RECOMMEND - the magnet on the money clip deactivated ALL of my cards, including my bank card. SO ANNOYING lost two gift cards and had to wait a week for new debit card in the mail.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Reeves

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: I bought about five of these for the guys in our family. None of them were thrilled. They were polite and thanked me, but, I've never seen one of them using it. Ask your guy first or if you're a guy, you'll know yourself. It's good quality, it just wasn't their style.
customer_reviews.author: D. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Great wallet for the money
customer_reviews.text: I really like this wallet but can't give it 5 stars because it simply won't hold all I need it to. But the compromise is to put the cards I don't use often in another place and use this wallet for the day to day things. It is much smaller and easier in the pocket and does hold about 75% of what I was carrying. All in all, you can't go wrong for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: The Money Clip Wallet You’ve Been Looking For!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been searching for a new wallet for my husband that he will actually use because he loves his old one, and I think I’ve found it! This wallet looks and feels and even smells like a designer wallet. I feel like I should have paid $100 for it not $15! It comes in a little cloth-like bag inside a very nice box. It has a really good magnet in the money clip, like it takes a second to get it open if there isn’t anything in it. I will definitely be recommending this wallet and I pray I can find this one again when the time comes!!!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: This wallet will wipe your mag stripes.
customer_reviews.text: I like this wallet. I like the size of it and what it can hold. But the magnetic clip is so strong it has wiped several cards I carry in my wallet. If you plan to use it for cards with mag stripes, I'd look somewhere else.
customer_reviews.author: Paco Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Worked great as a present
customer_reviews.text: My man doesn’t like a wallet but wanted to try a money clip. I purchased this as a present and he loves it. The magnet on the clip works great. He doesn’t keep woads of money but he normally does have a nice little bundle with him. I’m happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Slim wallet with money clip secure
customer_reviews.text: I like this wallet is slim, and provided just the space I needed. My other wallet was breaking and cracking all my cards, and this wallet makes it to where I don't have to worry about the bending of my cards. Easy to take in and out of this wallet. Has a thumb slide to have easy access to your picture Id cards.the money clip is sturdy, and grips the bills tightly, yet easy enough to open to access the bills. Has one pocket on the side as well
customer_reviews.author: Azzaro

customer_reviews.title: perfect size
customer_reviews.text: This wallet Is the perfect size for carrying only what you need. makes sitting comfortable and can carry In front pocket If you want to. Thinking of buying one for my brother! well worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: BRIAN

customer_reviews.title: a bit longer than your avg front pocket wallet
customer_reviews.text: I think there are diff sizes of wallet they are selling, if you want the one with 3 slots on one side (like the one i bought), it's going to be a bit longer, just remember that. So, then that wallet will become a 1/2-2/3 inch longer. Just be mindful of that. It put it in my front pocket so don't really have any issues with the length.
customer_reviews.author: mparikh

customer_reviews.title: Graduation gift
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my grandson for his high school graduation.....with some money in it, of course. He was very happy with it. Holds credit cards. driver's license as well as folded money. Good strong clip....opens easily and snaps closed with magnetic pull.
customer_reviews.author: Doyle w. Foxx

customer_reviews.title: For tight pockets, this is a great choice
customer_reviews.text: I needed a thin wallet for my front pocket and this fits the bill! This is just about the smallest thing you can use to hold money and cards. I love it’s thickness and other small dimensions. It’s barely noticeable in the front or back pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Great, if you only carry 3 cards
customer_reviews.text: I love how securely the money clip hold bills. I love the slim design I love the look. BUT... I carry more than 3 credit cards and a driver's license. I am keeping the wallet for going out, but I'm looking for something that holds more cards.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Bleyl

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my husband after he.lost his last wallet. I appreciate the security features. He likes the two pockets in addition to the clip. His last wallet had only one pocket so this makes for easier organization.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Solid product choice
customer_reviews.text: Went wallet shopping. Bought four in this style and price range on amazon. This is the winner. Quality packaging and presentation. Strong magnet. Feels and looks quality. Hope it holds up well. Will probably buy other colors in same line.
customer_reviews.author: Michael O.

customer_reviews.title: Meets my needs
customer_reviews.text: I needed a smaller wallet because my CCW does not leave a lot of room for a full sized wallet. This money clip works great, the magnet is very strong, so my bills are nice and secure. Room enough for 2 forms of id, and three ccs. Seems well made, I'm sure I'll have it for years.
customer_reviews.author: Moody

customer_reviews.title: Husband loves this wallet.
customer_reviews.text: Strong magnet, enough room for the important to carry items. Plenty of magnetic hold for some cash and fits in his front pocket perfectly. No more back problems from sitting on his wallet for 40 years.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality and Style.
customer_reviews.text: I love this wallet as I have been using it for like 6 months now, I feel its a good quality and you are able to hold a lot of bills, with no issues. The down fall is that you can put to much stuff inside so like 3-4 cards and maybe a few extra cards in the side pocket. Other then the amount of space, if you are someone that keeps it simple then I would recommend as it really keeps everything so tight and organized. I mainly bought this because the ID came out so fast, which works great. No complaints in my position.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholay

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic and stylish  money clip
customer_reviews.text: Great front pocket money clip. It holds just the right amount of cards. The magnetic clip that holds A large sum of bills. Like Kramer said, ‘I keep the Big bills up front!’ Only one thing I could add to this amazing item is that it was just a tad bit smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Slim, Very Snug
customer_reviews.text: This wallet has been great! I purchased it to replace a "normal" sized wallet that was losing shape and the ability to hold my cards. It is as slim as advertised, and holds everything inside very snuggly. It's actually a challenge to get a card out sometimes, but I'd rather have it be too tight than too loose. It's very comfortable to have in any pocket. The build quality seems sturdy so far, I suppose time will tell on that front. NOTE: This is NOT a wallet for the person that carries 26 different cards at once; you'll need to pick your top 5 or 6 and perhaps rotate them out, because this wallet won't hold more than that .
customer_reviews.author: Coleyone

customer_reviews.title: Great Slim Wallet
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what I was looking for. It only has a three pockets for three cards, but there is a pocket in the center for more cards if you need the extra space. The magnet is strong and has not damaged the magnetic strip on my cards as far as I know. My license easily slides out due to the whole for your finger to slide it up and grab it. The best thing is that when I sit down I can barely feel it, which is what I wanted. Would definitely recommend for those looking to replace bulkey wallets.
customer_reviews.author: RevOne

customer_reviews.title: Good quality front pocket wallet
customer_reviews.text: Bought this wallet thinking that if it busts then i am not out of that much money for it. I have had it for a couple weeks now and have to say I really like it. It is not as bulgy as some of my other wallets I have had. We will see how the leather is after a little wear but I am really impressed. I highly recommend this for someone looking for a new front pocket wallet
customer_reviews.author: krisrov

customer_reviews.title: I am glad that I did
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical of this wallet. I have had the same type of wallet for the last 15 years, just keep buying the same one. I decided on something different and decided to try this one. I am glad that I did, you can hold about 8 cards, your drivers license and few business cards in the wallet with a good deal of money and it is very slim and it doesn't bulge like my last wallet. Wish I would have bought this one years ago.
customer_reviews.author: j starlinf

customer_reviews.title: The second wallet you knew you needed
customer_reviews.text: My bulky wallet is no longer causing back pain - I took my frequently used IDs, cards and insurance info and keep it in a front pocket. Magnetic clip holds strong and this is very versatile.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin R Sperling

customer_reviews.title: The money clip magnet is awesome, and the ID holder has been good
customer_reviews.text: I've had this wallet a few months and the stitching near the credit card holders is unraveling. Might switch again here soon. The money clip magnet is awesome, and the ID holder has been good. I carry 2 ids, 2 credit, insurance card, and 1 gas card in this.
customer_reviews.author: J. Stover

customer_reviews.title: Super Strong Magnet
customer_reviews.text: Super strong magnet. The wallet will connect to metal surfaces through my pants and it is the oddest thing when you feel like you are snagged on something. Great wallet though. I have used it for 3+ years and it is still solid, a bit worn but all there.
customer_reviews.author: B. C. Black

customer_reviews.title: Love the wallet
customer_reviews.text: Love the wallet. Perfect for someone like me who was tired of sitting on a bifold all day. Still fits everything I need for EDC but is much slimmer and easier to carry. My only criticism is that the ID window is frosted plastic that partially obscures my ID. I would have preferred it to be completely clear. Not a deal breaker especially at this price point.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Wow, strong magnet works great.
customer_reviews.text: It’s been one year, review time. Love this wallet, super slim and holds everything I need. Just don’t be surprised when you feel yourself stick to something metal, the magnet is no joke and will stick to things right through your pants! PS- Don’t worry about having your phone in the same pocket, magnets don’t hurt smart phones.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. It appears to be high quality. Couple cons: 1.) a little bigger than I expected but still fits comfortably in the front pocket 2.) hard to get cards out of slots. Hoping it will be easier once it gets broken in. Worth the money. Would recommend to friends who are looking for a good money clip
customer_reviews.author: Darick Deel

customer_reviews.title: Love this wallet - get your life and wallet organized and priortized
customer_reviews.text: This wallet really helps with those men who have had big wallets in their pockets for way too long and causing them back problems. It doesn't carry a lot of stuff - which is what you want. It makes you organize and prioritize your wallet. The product looks great, and seems to be of very high quality. I can keep it in my front pockets without any problem.
customer_reviews.author: rcc-GTO

customer_reviews.title: Great wallet
customer_reviews.text: Best minimalist wallet I have owned. More than enough room for cards and cash. No problems at all with the magnet effecting my cards. The clip latches tight. Don’t have to worry about cash falling out. Great wallet
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great little wallet.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I finally replaced my clunky 3 fold wallet that was aggravating my back. This little wallet forces me to stop putting junk in there and lightens the load. I am also now a front pocket wallet user. My back thanks you for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: wstlyguy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent replacement for my tri-fold
customer_reviews.text: I travel a lot and found my tri-fold was a huge pain to carry in my front pocket and decided to give this a try. What a great buy it turned out to be. This carries all my cards and cash no problem and it's cumbersome in my pocket. Well made and looks great
customer_reviews.author: Joe Todd

customer_reviews.title: Get this ish Right hurr! Wallet stay lean! & cholesterol free! Son!
customer_reviews.text: These wallets stay illmatic! Yeah hard from me and the magnet stay intact so powerful that keeps you from buying other ish do to its ability to clamp down on your greenbacks and not allow you to ma impulse buy from any of your favorite gumball machines dishing out your favorite smile now cry later stickers!
customer_reviews.author: BgKdouble0h_WordMyLord #19967#

customer_reviews.title: Money Clip
customer_reviews.text: It's a awesome money clip. It does the job. Great material. The somewhat negative people might say is that it's hard to get the cards out . I rather the card to be hard to get out than be loose. The magnet is also strong and the money clip is very light. You might forget that it's in your pocket too. I would definitely recommend this money clip.👍🏽
customer_reviews.author: Boog

customer_reviews.title: Good compact wallet
customer_reviews.text: I have been using a regular wallet and this is my first time to use a small compact wallet. Don't expect it will hold everything in your regular wallets. You will need to get rid of those cards and stuff you don't really use a lot.
customer_reviews.author: E. Wu

customer_reviews.title: Not only for men, ladies would love this!
customer_reviews.text: FEMALES PAY ATTENTION! THIS WALLET IS PERFECT FOR YOU! FITS IN YOUR BRA, SO IF YOUR PURSE GETS SNATCHED, THEY WON'T GET YOUR CARDS, LISENCE,AND $! BUY YOURSELF ONE! GREAT WALLET!
customer_reviews.author: Claire

product_meta.title: kinzd Money Clip, Front Pocket Wallet,Leather RFID Blocking Strong Magnet thin Wallet, A Litch Pattern Black, One Size
feature_bullets: Soft Embossed Full-Grain Leather, Measures: 4.2" x 2.9" x 0.1" (10.7cm x 7.2cm x 0.3cm)
3 Card Slots,1 ID Display Window,1 Change pocket,1 Strong Magnetic Money Clip
Super Powerful Magnetism: With 4pcs Strong Magnets, Can Hold Plenty of cashes and cards; better than normal ones which is Only 2pcs Magnets

RFID Blocking Wallet: Keeps your vital information in cards from being stolen. Does Block 13.56 MHz Frequency (Credit cards, debit cards, driver license and ID cards); Does NOT Block 125 KHz frequency. Minimalist & Slim, Perfect fit in Front Pocket, Good Choose to replace bulky wallet
